companyDescription: New Jersey Newport Waterfront & Jersey City's Premier Choice for Residential & Commercial Handyman and Remodeling Services
aboutUsDescription: Welcome to Likewise Handyman, your local partner for dependable and professional handyman services in the Newport Waterfront and Jersey City areas of New Jersey. Our dedicated team of skilled professionals is committed to helping homeowners and businesses maintain and improve their spaces with ease and confidence. At Likewise Handyman, we take pride in delivering quality workmanship and exceptional service tailored to your needs.
ourMissionDescription: At Likewise Handyman, we provide a comprehensive range of handyman services, all handled by our experienced in-house team. Whether itâ€™s fixing a broken appliance, repairing drywall, painting, or tackling a renovation project, we bring expertise, efficiency, and care to every job. With a focus on quality and attention to detail, we aim to exceed your expectations and make your projects stress-free.
whyUsDescription: We stand out in the handyman industry by focusing on what matters most to our customers:
whyUsList1: Our pricing is competitive and transparent, ensuring you get the best value without compromising on quality.
whyUsList2: From initial consultation to project completion, our friendly and professional team ensures a smooth and enjoyable experience for you.
whyUsList3: All work is performed by our trusted in-house professionals, ensuring consistent service quality.
whyUsList4: We understand the value of your time. Our team is punctual, efficient, and professional, committed to completing your projects on time.
WhyUsFooter: Likewise Handyman is your go-to solution for handyman services you can trust. Let us help you create and maintain the spaces you'll love.
FlooringServicesDescription: Install or replace hardwood flooring, vinyl flooring, and tile flooring
WallRepairAndPaintingDescription: Repair wall cracks and repaint interior walls
KitchenAndBathroomDescription: Replace or install faucets, install water filtration systems, replace or install toilets, renovate bathrooms and cabinets
FurnitureAndLightingInstallationDescript: Assemble furniture such as wardrobes, desks, and beds, install various ceiling lights
ElectricalServicesDescription: Replace or install smart switches and outlets, replace or install door locks
OtherIndoorRemodelingDescription: Build new partition walls, install interior doors
ExteriorWallsWindowsAndDoorsDescription: Install or replace exterior walls, windows, and doors
OtherOutdoorRemodelingDescription: Build new partition walls, install interior doors
OurServicesDescription: We offer a wide range of services to meet your needs. Whether you need a new floor installed or a wall repaired, we have you covered.
